name: Five Nights at Freddy's: One More Time
name_original: Five Nights at Freddy's: One More Time
description:
STORY:

After the Freddy Fazbear Pizza was closed, they tried to open again, maybe it's the last attempt to keep the pizzeria open, it's been 10 years since Freddy Fazbear Pizza was closed.Everthing is very different, a lot has changed in the pizzeria until the systems, and made the place much bigger. All this because they believe it wouldn't go wrong this time.

História:

Depois que a Freddy Fazbear Pizza fechou, eles tentaram abrir novamente, talvez seja a última tentativa de manter a pizzaria aberta, já faz 10 anos que a Freddy Fazbear Pizza fechou. Está tudo muito diferente, muita coisa mudou na pizzaria até os sistemas e tornou o local muito maior. Tudo isso porque acreditam que não daria errado desta vez.
